term.title: scintillation detector

item.text: A radiation detector using a medium in which a burst of luminescenceradiation, produced along the path of an ionizing particle, is quantified.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 2513. 'Nomenclature for radioanalytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 2525 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466122513)
